cpsr.environment.components

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • cpsr.environment.components.Action
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Action
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class defines default actions. Can be extended, but all children must still represent each unique action by a positive integer.
    Author:
    William Hamilton
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
